content.rendered:
In northern Borneo, VINCI Construction Grands Projets completed work on the three high-rise buildings making up the Jesselton Residences in February 2017. This second project on the island comprises 125,000 m² of residential and retail space with sea views. It has a seven-storey podium over two underground levels and will accommodate a 20,000 m² shopping centre and more than 900 parking spaces, as well as three 20-storey residential towers with a total of 333 apartments.

VINCI Construction Grands Projets is also building the Menara Hap Seng high-rise in Kota Kinabalu.

excerpt.rendered: Following a first contract for an office building, VINCI Construction Grands Projets delivered a set of residential units on the Kota Kinabalu seafront in Borneo.
